sentences.english: It was originally an old-fashioned private school.
Improved of Zhili private schools had many specific measures.
sentences.chinese: 直隸私塾改良的具體措施有很多種。

sentences.english: Chapter One sums up the basic state of the ancient old-style private school education.
sentences.chinese: 第一章概述了古代私塾教育基本狀況。

sentences.english: Chapter Three elaborates the ancient old-style private school education's enlightenment to the modern Chinese education.
sentences.chinese: 第三章闡述了古代私塾教育對現代語文教育的啓示。

sentences.english: Traditional private school was a main type of non-governmental basic education in Chinese traditional society.
sentences.chinese: 私塾是中國傳統社會中民間基礎教育的一種主要形式。

sentences.english: Old-style private education had reached unprecedented heyday in Ming dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 私塾教育，在明代發展到了前所未有的鼎盛時期。

sentences.english: Very few talented children may jump grades, or choose home education.
sentences.chinese: 超常兒童很難跳級，或接受私塾教育。

sentences.english: Sishu is the main form of the traditional education in China.
sentences.chinese: 私塾是我國傳統教育的主要形式。

sentences.english: The reform of the old-style private schools was in progress, following the practice of compulsory education.
sentences.chinese: 私塾改良的進程隨着義務教育的推進而不斷深入。

sentences.english: Most home schooling systems also usethis approach.
sentences.chinese: 大多數私塾也用這種方法。

definition: a person who has passed the county level imperial exam (historical)/scholar/skillful writer/fine talent
academy of classical learning (Tang Dynasty - Qing Dynasty)
to read a book/to study/to attend school
Imperial College (or Academy), the highest educational body in imperial China
candidate who has not yet passed the county level imperial exam
